name: Equipment Rent
detail: Xdozer works with both customers and vendors in the same marketplace, we maintain a network of most of the vendors in the country.

name: Used Equipment Market
detail: Xdozer is offering a great place to buy and sell used equipment with registered potential customers and equipment vendors.

name: Spare Parts Supply
detail: Xdozer made a comprehensive network with some big authentic spare parts providers who will benefit you during your equipment breakdown.

name: Site Construction
detail: Xdozer works with Industrial construction sites involve large-scale projects with a high degree of complexity.

name: Material Supply
detail: We have made this platform not only for equipment renting but also for providing your required spare parts that is essential after break-down

name: Consultancy
detail: We are dedicated to provide you consultancy about your construction site and equipment renting that can help you to make the perfect decision.
